resources.string: Newly landed immigrants are supported by the government, however, many can still face issues in a unfamiliar country. Some of these struggles include financial struggles, as well locating places specific to their culture.

Whether it be restaurants or grocery stores that sell food/ingredients related to their culture, or thrift stores, providing budget options for clothing, Localify looks to help newly landed immigrants find important services and communal places in their area.

To use Localify, begin by selecting your
ethnicity. Then you can go ahead and
browse nearby locations that match your
ethnicity. To add a location to your favourites,
select the associated marker, and
tap the plus button.
Welcome! Please select your ethnicity/origin to get started!
